A fūinjutsu designed to drain [[chakra]]. By placing the seal on the target, the chakra drained is transferred to the user. It was used to absorb the remaining remnants of [[Orochimaru]]'s chakra that was inside [[Anko Mitarashi]]'s [[Cursed Seal of Heaven|cursed seal]].

[[de:Chakura Kyuuin no In]]
[[fr:Sceau de Drain de Chakra]]
[[pl:Pieczęć Wsysająca Czakrę]]
[[pt-br:Selo de Drenagem de Chakra]]
